description: To address the elevation of privilege issue associated with CVE-2023-36403, it is necessary to apply the appropriate updates based on your Windows version. For Windows 10 (builds 10.0.19045.3693, 10.0.19041.3693), KB5032199 and KB5032189 must be installed. For Windows 11 (build 10.0.22621.2715), updates KB5032190 are required. Ensure that you use the correct update packages based on your system architecture (64-bit or 32-bit). The update packages can be downloaded from the following links: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032197, https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032192, https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032199, and https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032249. Once the relevant patches are installed, restart the system to complete the installation process and ensure that the vulnerability is mitigated.
